h2.a: Canby Public Schools COVID-19 Response Page

div.p:
Tuesday, March 17, 2020
The Trapshooting meeting has been cancelled for tonight, but participants are asked to stop by Eiler's Repair sometime between the hours...
Hello from your librarian.In honor of National Library Week we are asking you to send us pictures of your child reading in their favorite spots. Let's have a little fun and...

This afternoon Governor Walz announced the State of Minnesota will be extending the school closure and distance learning through the end of the school year. The executive order also states that Friday, May 1 and Monday, May 4 are planning days for teachers. Students will not receive distance-learning instruction on either of these two days. Distance learning will then start again on Tuesday, May 5 and continue distance learning until May 22. The district will be sending home more information about the closure in the next few days. Thank you and be safe!
PROM: After much deliberation over the past month, sadly we have determined that we will be canceling Prom for the 2019-2020 school year.
Hello from Canby Public Schools. Please click on the link for a short video from Canby Public Schools. https://youtu.be/u_kKKS3YwTU
